DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether aerobic exercise can enhance the effects of exposure therapy treatment for fear of heights.
DOC.brief_title: Exercise and Virtual Reality Exposure Therapy for Acrophobia
DOC.criteria: Age 18 to 25 Speaks English fluently Score of 80 or higher on the Acrophobia Questionnaire SUDS rating of 50 or higher on the Behavioral Avoidance Test or complete refusal to comply with instructions due to intensity of fear Passes the Physical Activity Readiness QuestionnairePlus Hearing or visually impaired Currently receiving exposurebased treatment for acrophobia Able to remain on floor 20 for 30 seconds during BAT with a SUDS rating < 50
